trans-unit.resname: F16·1 | Nissa's Pilgrimage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nissa's Pilgrimage
trans-unit.target: Nissa's Pilgrimage

trans-unit.resname: F16·1 | Nissa's Pilgrimage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: F16·1 | Nissa's Pilgrimage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, search your library for up to three basic Forest cards instead of two.
trans-unit.target: Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, search your library for up to three basic Forest cards instead of two.

trans-unit.source: Clash of Wills
trans-unit.target: Clash of Wills

trans-unit.resname: F16·2 | Clash of Wills | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
trans-unit.target: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

trans-unit.resname: F16·2 | Clash of Wills | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The mind of an Eldrazi is a puzzle that can never be solved. The trick is to make sure a piece goes missing."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: "The mind of an Eldrazi is a puzzle that can never be solved. The trick is to make sure a piece goes missing."\n—Jace Beleren

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact. CARDNAME deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
trans-unit.target: Destroy target artifact. CARDNAME deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.

trans-unit.resname: F16·3 | Smash to Smithereens | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All these old relics have one thing in common. Every last one of them is made of smithereens."\n—Zada of Slab Haven
trans-unit.target: "All these old relics have one thing in common. Every last one of them is made of smithereens."\n—Zada of Slab Haven
